instructions: Welcome to SoulSworn! This is a story-based card game where your choices matter.
Each player will take turns drawing cards and placing them on the story grid.
Token Setup: Each player has 3 tokens representing their character attributes - Rational (blue), Emotional (red), and Physical (green). Set your starting values based on your character.
To adjust your tokens, click on the token and type a number, or use the arrow keys to increase/decrease values. Each character has a maximum of 10 points total across all attributes.
You can use your character's attributes (Rational, Emotional, Physical) to overcome challenges.
The game continues until you complete your objective or run out of scenes.
Use the d20 to resolve any conflicts or challenges that arise during gameplay.
